T01bsu033_u:459: valgurmanojño 'secanako 'pratikūlaḥ śravaṇāya, anityaṃ śāntamanātmeti sukhaśravanīyo yasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrotrendriyābhāsamāgacchati |

T01bsu033_u:510: virocate yadidamudyānavimānavastrābharaṇairādhipatyena ṛddhyā vā prātihāryeṇa vā aiśvaryeṇa vā ānanda, sa khalu dharmābhisamayena
T01bsu033_u:513: evaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā draṣṭavyāḥ || Sukhv_20 ||
T01bsu033_u:515: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāhṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite samantāccaturdiśamākulāḥ samākulā vāyavo vānti |
T01bsu033_u:516: teṣāṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ citrān darśanīyān nānāvarṇānanekavṛntān nānāsurabhidivyagandhaparivāsitān kṣobhayanti saṃkṣobhayanti īrayanti samīrayanti yato bahūni puṣpaśatāni tasyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ prapatanti manojñagandhāni darśanīyāni |
T01bsu033_u:518: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṣpasaṃstaraṃ saṃstṛṇuyāt, ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ
T01bsu033_u:521: tāni ca puṣpajātāni mṛdūni kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśāni aupamyamātreṇa, yāni nikṣipte pāde caturaṅgulamavanamanti, utkṣipte pāde caturaṅgulamevonnamanti |
T01bsu033_u:522: nirgate punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye tāni puṣpāṇi niravaśeṣamantardhīyante |
T01bsu033_u:523: athe tadbuddhakṣetraṃ viviktaṃ ramyaṃ śubhaṃ bhavatyaparikliṣṭaiḥ pūrvapuṣpaiḥ |
T01bsu033_u:524: tataḥ punarapi samantāccaturdiśaṃ vāyavo vānti, ye pūrvavadabhinavāni puṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti
T01bsu033_u:526: pūrvāhṇe, evaṃ madhyāhnakālasamaye saṃdhyāyāṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme
T01bsu033_u:528: taiśca vātairvāyadbhirnānāgandhaparivāsitaiste sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma nirodhasamāpanno bhikṣuḥ ||
T01bsu033_u:532: sarvaśo rātriṃdivaṃ prajñaptirapi nāsti anyatra tathāgatavyavahārāt,
T01bsu033_u:535: tasyāṃ khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle divyagandhodakameghā abhipravarṣayanti divyāni sarvavarṇikāni kusumāni, divyāni saptaratnāni,
T01bsu033_u:537: divyāni sarvavarṇikāni kusumāni, divyāni (Sukhv, Vaidya 240) vitānāni dhriyante,
T01bsu033_u:538: divyāni cchatraratnāni sarvābharaṇānyākāśe dhriyante, divyāni vādyāni pravādyante, divyāścāpsaraso nṛtyanti || Sukhv_23 ||
T01bsu033_u:540: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvā upapannā utpadyante utpasyante, sarve te niyatāḥ samyaktve yāvannirvāṇam |
T01bsu033_u:542: nāsti tatra dvayo rāśyorvyavasthānaṃ prajñaptirvā yadidamaniyatasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā |
T01bsu033_u:543: tadanenāpyānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate saṃkṣiptena, na punarvistareṇa
T01bsu033_u:545: parikṣīyeta sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtyamāneṣu, na ca teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ śakyaṃ paryantamadhigantum || Sukhv_24 ||
T01bsu033_u:547: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu033_u:549: te kalpakoṭīmatha vāpi cottariṃ sukhāvatīvarṇa prakāśayeyuḥ // Sukhv_vs_23
T01bsu033_u:550: kṣaye kalpakoṭī vajre surāśca sukhāvatīye na ca varṇasāruḥ /
T01bsu033_u:551: kṣayaṃ na gacchetpratibhā ca teṣāṃ prakāśayantāna tu varṇa nānāṃ //
T01bsu033_u:552: ye lokadhātū paramāṇusādṛśāṃśchidyeya bhidyeya rajaśca kuryāt /
T01bsu033_u:553: ato bahū uttari lokadhātu pūreta dānaṃ ratanāhi dadyāt // Sukhv_vs_25 //
T01bsu033_u:554: naitā kalāpi upamāpi tasya puṇyasya bhontī pṛthulokadhātavaḥ /
T01bsu033_u:555: ye lokadhātūya sukhāvatīye śrutvaiva nāmaṃ bhavatīha puṇyam // Sukhv_vs_26
T01bsu033_u:556: tato bahū puṇya bhaveta teṣāṃ ye śraddhate jinavacanaṃ saprajñāḥ /
T01bsu033_u:557: śraddhā hi mūlaṃ jagatasya prāptaye tasmāddhi śrutvā vicitiṃ vinodayet //
T01bsu033_u:561: tasya khalu punarānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu033_u:562: ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ (Sukhv, Vaidya 241) parikīrtayante, varṇaṃ
T01bsu033_u:564: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye kecitsattvāstasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā cāntaśa ekacittotpādamapyadhyāśayena prasādasahagatena
T01bsu033_u:567: ye cānanda kecitsattvāstaṃ tathāgataṃ punaḥ satkāramanasikariṣyanti,
T01bsu033_u:568: bahvaparimitaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropayiṣyanti bodhaye cittaṃ pariṇāmya, tatra ca lokadhātāvupapattaye praṇidhāsyanti, teṣāṃ so 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu033_u:571: tataste taṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittāścyutāḥ santastatraiva sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante
T01bsu033_u:572: yaśca ānanda ākāṅkṣeta kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kimityahaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyeyamiti, tenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya
T01bsu033_u:573: adhyāśayātiśayatayā saṃtatyā tasmin buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣya upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayitavyāni || Sukhv_27 ||
T01bsu033_u:575: ye punastaṃ tathāgataṃ na bhūyo manasikariṣyanti, na ca bahvaparimitaṃ
T01bsu033_u:577: 'mitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho varṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhena bhikṣusaṃghaparivāreṇa ca tādṛśa eva buddhinirmito maraṇakālasamaye
T01bsu033_u:579: te tenaiva tathāgatadarśanaprasādālambanena samādhinā apramuṣitayā smṛtyā cyutāstatraiva buddhakṣetre pratyājaniṣyanti ||
T01bsu033_u:582: spṛhāṃ ca tasmin buddhakṣetra utpādayiṣyanti, gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu
T01bsu033_u:583: bhāṣyamāṇeṣu tuṣṭiṃ pratilapsyante, na vipatsyante,na viṣādamāpatsyante,na
T01bsu033_u:585: manasikariṣyanti, spṛhāṃ cotpādayiṣyanti tasmin buddhakṣetre, te 'pi
T01bsu033_u:589: imaṃ khalvānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya tathāgatā daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmagheyaṃ parikīrtayanto varṇaṃ ghoṣayantaḥ saṃpraśaṃsāmabhyudīrayanti tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvāstamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramanti darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya, taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃśca buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadviśeṣān draṣṭum
T01bsu033_u:591: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā paridīpayannimā gāthā abhāṣata
T01bsu033_u:592: yathaiva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhāna kṣetrā amitāyunāyakam // Sukhv_vs_28
T01bsu033_u:594: bahupuṣpapūṭī gṛhītva te nānāvarṇaṃ surabhī manoramāṃ /
T01bsu033_u:596: tatha dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu buddhāna kṣetrā daśatāsu yāttakāḥ /
T01bsu033_u:597: yato yato āgami buddha vandituṃ sabodhisattvā amitāyunāyakam //
T01bsu033_u:600: pūjitva vā te bahubodhisattvā vanditva pādāmamitaprabhasya /
T01bsu033_u:601: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vadanti caivaṃ aho 'dbhutaṃ śobhati buddhakṣetram //
T01bsu033_u:602: te puṣpapūṭīhi punokiranti udagracittā atulāya prītiye /
T01bsu033_u:603: kāmaṃ prabhāṣanti purasta nāyake asmāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam //
T01bsu033_u:604: ye puṣpapūṭā iti kṣipta tatra chatraṃtayā saṃsthihi yojanāśatam /
T01bsu033_u:605: svalaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati citraravato chādante buddhasya samanta kāyam //
T01bsu033_u:606: te bodhisattvā tathā satkaritvā kathaṃ karontī iti tuṣṭa tatra /
T01bsu033_u:607: sulabdha lābhāḥ khalu tehi sattvaiḥ yehī śrutaṃ nāma narottamasya //
T01bsu033_u:608: asmehi pī lābha sulabdhapūrvā yadā gatāsya ima buddhakṣetram /
T01bsu033_u:609: paśyātha svapnopama maitra kīdṛśaṃ yatkalpitaṃ kalpasahasra śāstuḥ //
T01bsu033_u:611: paśyātha buddhā vara puṇyarāśiḥ parivṛto śobhati bodhisattvaiḥ /
T01bsu033_u:612: amitābhasya ābhā amitā ca tejā amitaṃ ca āyūramitaśca saṃghaḥ //
T01bsu033_u:614: ye niścaritvā mukhamaṇḍalātaḥ sphūranti kṣetrāṇi sahasrakoṭīḥ //
T01bsu033_u:615: tāḥ sarvasūrīḥ punaretya tatra mūrdhe ca astaṃ gami nāyakasya /
T01bsu033_u:616: devā manuṣyā janayanti prītiṃ arcistadā asyamidāṃ viditvā // Sukhv_vs_39
T01bsu033_u:617: uttiṣṭhate buddhasuto mahāyaśā nātha so hi avalokiteśvaraḥ /
T01bsu033_u:618: ko heturatra bhagavaṃ kaḥ pratyayo yena smitaṃ kurvasi lokanātha //
T01bsu033_u:619: taṃ vyākarohī yatra so 'rthakovido hitānukampī bahusattvamocakaḥ /
T01bsu033_u:620: śrutveti vācaṃ paramāṃ manoramāṃ udagracittā bhaviṣyanti sattvāḥ //
T01bsu033_u:621: ye bodhisattvā bahulokadhātutaḥ sukhāvatīṃ prasthita buddha paśyatāṃ /
T01bsu033_u:622: te śrutvā prītiṃ vipulāṃ janetvā kṣipramimaṃ kṣetra vilokayeyuḥ //
T01bsu033_u:623: āgatya ca kṣetramidaṃ udāraṃ ṛddhībalaṃ prāpuṇi kṣiprameva /
T01bsu033_u:624: divyaṃ ca cakṣustatha śrotra divyaṃ jātismarāḥ pāramikovidāśca //
T01bsu033_u:625: amitāyu buddhastada vyākaroti mama hyayaṃ praṇidhi babhūva pūrvam /
T01bsu033_u:626: kathaṃ pi sattvā śruṇiyāni nāma vrajeyu kṣetraṃ mama nityameva //
T01bsu033_u:628: sa me ayaṃ praṇidhi prapūrṇa śobhanā sattvāśca ebhi bahulokadhātutaḥ /
T01bsu033_u:629: āgatya kṣipraṃ mama antikasmiṃ avaivartikā bhontiha ekajātiyā //
T01bsu033_u:630: tasmādya icchatiha bodhisattvaḥ mamāpi kṣetraṃ siya evarūpam /
T01bsu033_u:631: ahaṃ pi sattvān bahu mocayeyaṃ nāmena ghoṣeṇa tha darśanena // Sukhv_vs_46
T01bsu033_u:632: sa śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchatu lokadhātum /
T01bsu033_u:633: gattvā ca pūrvamamitaprabhasya pūjetu buddhāna sahasrakoṭīḥ // Sukhv_vs_47
T01bsu033_u:634: buddhāna koṭī bahu pūjayitvā ṛddhībalena bahu kṣetra gattvā /
T01bsu033_u:635: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ sugatāna santike bhaktyā gamiṣyanti sukhāvatītaḥ //
T01bsu033_u:638: tasya khalu punarānanda amitāyuṣastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhivṛkṣaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:645: tasya khalu punarānanda bodhivṛkṣasya vātasamīritasya yaḥ śabdo ghoṣo niścarati so
T01bsu033_u:647: tatrānanda yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sa bodhivṛkṣaḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgacchati, teṣāṃ śrotrarogo na pratikāṅkṣitavyo yāvadbodhiparyantam |
T01bsu033_u:648: yeṣāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyātulyāmāpyāparimāṇānabhilāpyānāṃ sattvānāṃ sa bodhivṛkṣaścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchati, teṣāṃ cakṣūrogo na pratikāṅkṣitavyo yāvadbodhiparyantam |
T01bsu033_u:649: ye khalu punarānanda sattvāstato bodhivṛkṣādgandhaṃ jighranti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu ghrāṇaroagaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:650: ye sattvāstato bodhivṛkṣatphalānyāsvādayanti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu jihvārogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:651: ye sattvāstasya bodhivṛkṣasyābhayā sphuṭā (Sukhv, Vaidya 245) bhavanti, teṣāṃ yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu kāyarogaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:652: ye ca khalu punarānanda sattvāstaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ dharmato nidhyāyanti, teṣāṃ tata upādāya yāvadbodhiparyantaṃ na jātu cittavikṣepaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:653: sarve ca te sattvāḥ sahadarśanāttasya bodhivṛkṣasyāvaivartikāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante yadutānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
T01bsu033_u:654: tisraśca kṣāntīḥ pratilabhante yadidaṃ ghoṣānugāmanulomikīmanutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ ca tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena pūrvajinakṛtādhikāratayā pūrvapraṇidhānaparicaryayā ca susamāpyayā subhāvitayānūnāvikalatayā || Sukhv_32 ||
T01bsu033_u:656: tatraiva khalu punarānanda ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyante pratyājaniṣyante vā, sarve te ekajātipratibaddhāstata evānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante sthāpayitvā praṇidhānavaśaṃ ye te
T01bsu033_u:657: bodhisattvā mahāsiṃhanādanādina udārasaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ sarvasattvaparinirvāṇābhiyuktāśca || START Sukhv 34:
T01bsu033_u:658: tasmina khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye śrāvakānte vyāmaprabhāḥ, te bodhisattvāste yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhāḥ, sthāpayitvā dvau bodhisattvau
T01bsu033_u:659: yayoḥ prabhayā sā lokadhātuḥ satatasamitaṃ nityāvabhāsasphuṭā |
T01bsu033_u:660: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃnāmadheyau bhagavaṃstau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau? bhagavānāha - ekastayorānanda avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dvitīyo mahāsthāmaprāpto nāma |
T01bsu033_u:661: ita eva cānanda buddhakṣetrāccyutā tau tatropapannau || Sukhv_34 ||
T01bsu033_u:663: tatra cānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ, sarve te dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇasamanvāgatāḥ paripūrṇagātrā dhyānābhijñākovidāḥ
T01bsu033_u:664: prajñāprabhedakuśalāstīkṣṇendriyāḥ susaṃvṛtendriyā ājñātāvīndriyā adīnābalendriyāḥ pratilambhakṣāntikā anantāparyantaguṇāḥ || Sukhv_35 ||
T01bsu033_u:666: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvā pratyājātāḥ, sarve te 'virahitā buddhadarśanenāvinipātadharmāṇo yāvadbodhiparyantam |
T01bsu033_u:667: sarve te tata upādāya na jātu jātismarā bhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā tathārūpeṣu kalpasaṃkṣobheṣu ye pūrvasthānapraṇihitāḥ pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu vartamāneṣu
T01bsu033_u:668: yadā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi || Sukhv_36
T01bsu033_u:670: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ, sarve te ekapurobhaktenānyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā anekāni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupatiṣṭhanti yāvadākāṅkṣanti buddhānubhāvena
T01bsu033_u:671: | te yathā yathā cittamutpādayanti evamevaṃrūpaiḥ puṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantītūryasaṃgītivādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāma iti, teṣāṃ sahacittotpādāttathārūpāṇi ca sarvapūjāvidhānāni pāṇau prādurbhavanti te taiḥ puṣpairyāvadvādyaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu pūjāṃ kurvanto bahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamupacinvanti |
T01bsu033_u:672: sacetpunarākāṅkṣanti evaṃrūpāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavantviti, teṣāṃ sahacittotpādānnānāvarṇā anekavarṇā nānāgandhā divyāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavanti |
T01bsu033_u:673: te taistathārūpaiḥ puṣpapuṭaistān buddhān bhagavato 'vakiranti abhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti
T01bsu033_u:674: teṣāṃ ca yaḥ sarvaparītaḥ puṣpapuṭa (Sukhv, Vaidya 246) utsṛṣṭaḥ sa daśayojanavistaraṃ puṣpacchatraṃ prādurbhavati uparyantarīkṣe |
T01bsu033_u:675: dvitīye cānutsṛṣṭe na prathamo dharaṇyāṃ prapatati |
T01bsu033_u:676: santi tatra puṣpapuṭā ya utsṛṣṭāḥ santo viṃśatiyojanavistārāṇi puṣpacchatrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe prādurbhavanti |
T01bsu033_u:680: tatra ye udāraṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ saṃjanayanti, udāraṃ ca cittaudvilyaṃ pratilabhante, te bahvaparimitamasaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropya bahūni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyupasthāya ekapūrvāhṇena punarapi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pratiṣṭhante
T01bsu033_u:681: tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānaparigraheṇa pūrvadattadharmaśravaṇena pūrvajināvaropitakuśalamūlatayā pūrvapraṇidhānasamṛddhiparipūryātmabhūtayā suvibhaktabhāvitayā START Sukhv 38:
T01bsu033_u:682: tasmin khalu punarānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ, sarve te sarvajñatāsahagatāmeva dharmakathāṃ kathayanti |
T01bsu033_u:683: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ kācitparigrahasaṃjñāsti |
T01bsu033_u:684: te sarve ca tadbuddhakṣetramanucaṃkramamāṇā anuvicaranto na ratiṃ nāratimutpādayanti |
T01bsu033_u:687: tatra khalu punarānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ
T01bsu033_u:690: samacittā maitracittā mṛducittāḥ snigdhacittāḥ karmaṇyacittāḥ prasannacittāḥ sthiracittā vinīvaraṇacittā akṣubhitacittā alulitacittāḥ prajñāpāramitācaryācaraṇacittāścittādhārabuddhipraviṣṭāḥ |
T01bsu033_u:694: cakṣurabhinirharanti, prajñācakṣurgatiṃgatā dharmacakṣuḥpāragatā buddhacakṣurniṣpādayanto darśayanto dyotayanto vistareṇa prakāśayanto 'saṅgajñānamabhinirharanti |
T01bsu033_u:695: traidhātukasamatāyāmabhiyuktā dāntacittāḥ śāntacittāḥ sarvadharmadhātūpalabdhisamanvāgatāḥ samudayaniruktikuśalā dharmaniruktisamanvāgatā hārāhārakuśalā nayānayakuśalāḥ sthānakuśalā laukikīṣu kathāsvanapekṣā viharanti |
T01bsu033_u:697: sarvadharmaparyeṣṭikuśalāḥ sarvadharmaprakṛtivyupaśamajñānavihāriṇo 'nupalambhagocarā niṣkiṃcanā nirupādānā niścintā nirupadhayo 'nupādāya suvimuktā anaṅgaṇā aparyasthāyino 'bhijñāsu amūlasthāyino 'saṅgācārikā anavalīnā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā na saṃsīdanti dūranubodhabuddhajñānapraveśodgatā ekāyanamārgānuprāptā nirvicikitsāstīrṇakathaṃkathā aparapratyayajñānā anadhimāninaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:728: mahādharmabherīṃ parāghnanto mahādharmaśaṅkhamāpūrayanto mahādharmadhvajamucchrāpayanto dharmolkāṃ prajvālayantaḥ prajñāvilokino 'saṃmūḍhā nirdoṣāḥ śāntakhilāḥ śuddhā
T01bsu033_u:729: nirāmagandhā alubdhāḥ saṃvibhāgaratā muktatyāgāḥ prasṛtapāṇayo dānasaṃvibhāgaratā dharmāmiṣābhyāṃ dāne 'matsariṇo 'saṃsṛṣṭā
T01bsu033_u:730: urtrastamānasā viraktā dhīrā dhaureyā dhṛtimanto hrīmantaḥ suvyūḍhasattvā nirgāḍhāḥ prāptābhijñāḥ suratāḥ sukhasaṃvāsā arthakarā lokapradyotā nāpadāgantuṃ dhīrā rāgaṃ tamaḥ pranekasvaṣṭhaḥ(?) śokāpagatā nirmalā nimeṣaprahīṇā vikrīḍitābhijñā hetubalikāḥ praṇidhānabalikā ajihmā akuṭilā
T01bsu033_u:731: ete lakṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā utpāṭitamānaśalyā apagatarāgadveṣamohāḥ śuddhāḥ śuddhādhimuktā jinabalapraśastā lokapaṇḍitā uttaptajñānasamudāgatā jinasutāścittaudbilyasamanvāgatāḥ śūrā dṛḍhā amamā akhilā atulā arajaskāḥ sahitā udārā ṛṣabhā hrīmanto dhṛtimantaḥ smṛtimanto
T01bsu033_u:732: matimanto gatimantaḥ prajñāśastrapraharaṇā puṇyavanto dyutimanto vyapagatakhilā malaprahīṇāḥ smṛtiyuktāḥ śāntajñānālambhāḥ |
T01bsu033_u:733: īdṛśā ānanda tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca |
T01bsu033_u:734: vistareṇa punaḥ sacetkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasthitikenāpyāyuṣpramāṇena tathāgatā nirdiśyeran,naiva śakyaṃ teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ guṇaparyantamadhigantum, na ca tathāgatasya vaiśāradyopacchedo bhavet |
T01bsu033_u:735: tatkasya hetoḥ? ubhayamapyeva ānanda acintyamatulyaṃ yadidaṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ guṇāstathāgatasya cānuttaraprajñāpratibhānam || Sukhv_38 ||
T01bsu033_u:737: api cānanda uttiṣṭha, paścānmukhībhūtvā puṣpāvakīrṇāñjalīṃ pragṛhya
T01bsu033_u:739: eṣā sā dig yatra sa bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan
T01bsu033_u:740: samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati, dharmaṃ ca deśayati virajo viśuddhaṃ yasya tannāmadheyamanāvaraṇe daśadiśi loke vighuṣṭam ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti stuvanti
T01bsu033_u:745: samanantarabhāṣitā āyuṣmatānandeneyaṃ (Sukhv, Vaidya 248) vāk, atha tāvadeva so
T01bsu033_u:748: tena khalu punaḥ samayena sarvatra koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ ye kecitkālaparvatā vā ratnaparvatā vā merumahāmerumucilindamahāmucilindacakravālamahācakravālā vā citayo vā stambhā vā vṛkṣagahanodyānavimānāni divyamanuṣyakāṇi, tāni sarvāṇi tasya
T01bsu033_u:750: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo vyāmamātrake 'nvito dvitīyaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyavekṣedāditye 'bhyudgate, evamevāsmin buddhakṣetre bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmadrākṣustamamitābhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sumerumiva parvatarājaṃ sarvakṣetrābhyudgataṃ sarvā diśo 'bhibhūya
T01bsu033_u:751: bhāsamānaṃ tapantaṃ virocamānaṃ vibhrājamānam, taṃ ca mahāntaṃ
T01bsu033_u:752: bodhisattvagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ yadidaṃ buddhānubhāvena tasyāḥ prabhāyāḥ pariśuddhatvāt
T01bsu033_u:754: tatra na vṛkṣā na parvatā na dvīpā na tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo na nadīśvabhraprapātāḥ prajñāpayeran, anyatraikārṇavībhūtā mahāpṛthivyekā syāt, evameva tasmin buddhakṣetre nāstyanyatkiṃcilliṅgaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā anyatraiva vyāmaprabhāḥ śrāvakāste ca yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhā
T01bsu033_u:756: sa ca bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇamabhibhūya sarvā diśaḥ prabhāsayan
T01bsu033_u:758: tena khalvapi samayena tasyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakadevamanuṣyāśca sarve te imāḥ sahālokadhātuṃ śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamarhatā bhikṣusaṃghena parivṛtaṃ paśyanti sma dharmaṃ deśayantam || Sukhv_39 ||
T01bsu033_u:760: tatra khalu bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma -
T01bsu033_u:767: dvijasaṃghān sarvabuddhakṣetraṃ buddhasvareṇābhivijñāpayantaṃ yenaite bodhisattvā nityamavirahitā buddhānusmṛtyā? ajita āha - paśyāmi bhagavan |
T01bsu033_u:768: bhagavānāha - paśyasi punastvamajita atra buddhakṣetre 'mūn sattvān yojanaśatasahasrikeṣu vimāneṣvabhirūḍhānantarīkṣe sasatkārān krāmantaḥ?
T01bsu033_u:770: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita asti kiṃcinnānātvaṃ devānāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sukhāvatyāṃ
T01bsu033_u:771: manuṣyāṇāṃ vā? ajita āha - ekamapyahaṃ bhagavan nānātvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yāvanmaharddhikā atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ |
T01bsu033_u:773: paśyasi punastvamajita tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsam? āha - tadyathāpi nāma devāstrāyastriṃśā devā yāmā vā pañcāśadyojanikeṣu vā (Sukhv, Sukhv, Vaidya
T01bsu033_u:774: 249) yojanaśatikeṣu vā pañcayojanaśatikeṣu vā vimāneṣu praviṣṭāḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti, evamevāhaṃ bhagavan atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāveteṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmudāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsaṃ paśyāmi || Sukhv_40
T01bsu033_u:776: santi khalu punaratra bhagavan sattvā ya aupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti |
T01bsu033_u:777: tatko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadanye garbhāvāsaṃ prativasanti, anye punaraupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ
T01bsu033_u:778: prādurbhavanti? bhagavānāha - ye te ajita bodhisattvā anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ
T01bsu033_u:779: vicikitsāmutpādayanti, tena cittena kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, teṣāmatra garbhāvāso bhavati
T01bsu033_u:780: ye punarnirvicikitsāmutpādya cchinnakāṅkṣāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmasaṅgajñānamevākalpayanti abhiśraddadhati adhimucyante,te
T01bsu033_u:782: ye te ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anyatra buddhakṣetreṣu sthitāścittamutpādayanti amitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya, na vicikitsāmutpādayanti,
T01bsu033_u:783: na kāṅkṣanti asaṅgaṃ buddhajñānam, svakuśalamūlaṃ cābhiśraddadhati,
T01bsu033_u:784: teṣāmaupapādukānāṃ paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhūtānāṃ muhūrtamātreṇa evaṃrūpaḥ kāyo bhavati tadyathānyeṣāṃ ciropapannānāṃ sattvānām |
T01bsu033_u:785: paśya ajita prajñāviśeṣaṃ prajñāvaimātryaṃ prajñāparihāṇiṃ prajñāparīttatām - yattu hitāya pañcavarṣaśatāni parihīṇā bhavanti buddhadarśanādbodhisattvadarśanāddharmaśravaṇāddharmasaṃkathanāt kuśalamūlacaryāyāḥ parihīṇā bhavanti sarvakuśalamūlasaṃpattibhiḥ yadidaṃ vicikitsāpatitaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ |
T01bsu033_u:786: tadyathāpi nāma ajita rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya bandhanāgāraṃ bhavetsarvasauvarṇavaiḍūryapratyuptamavasaktapaṭṭamālyadāmakalāpaṃ nānāraṅgavibhavavitānaṃ dūṣyapaṭṭasaṃchannaṃ nānāpuṣpakusumābhikīrṇamudāradhūpanirdhūpitaṃ prāsādaharmyaniryūhagavākṣavedikātoraṇavicitraṃ saptaratnaṃ
T01bsu033_u:788: tatra tasya sa rājñaḥ putraḥ kenacideva kṛtyena prakṣipya jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayairnigaḍairbaddho bhavati |
T01bsu033_u:789: tasya ca tatra paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ syādanekagoṇikāstīrṇastūlikāparṇakāstīrṇaḥ kāliṅgaprāvaraṇapratyāstaraṇasottarapadacchada ubhayāntalohitopadhānaścitro darśanīyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:790: sa tatra tadābhiṣaṇṇo vā abhisaṃpanno vā bhavet |
T01bsu033_u:791: bahu cāsyānekavidhaṃ śuci vinītaṃ pānabhojanaṃ tatropanāmyeta |
T01bsu033_u:792: tatkiṃ manyase ajita udārastasya rājaputrasya sa paribhogo bhavet? ajita āha - udāro bhagavan
T01bsu033_u:793: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ajita api tvāsvādayettatra niśāmayecca,tena vā tuṣṭiṃ vidyāt?āha
T01bsu033_u:795: api tu khalu punaryadyapanītya rājñā tatra bandhanāgāre prakṣipto bhavet,sa tato mokṣamevākāṅkṣet
T01bsu033_u:796: abhijātān kumārānamātyān stryāgārān śreṣṭhino gṛhapatīn koṭṭarājāṃśca paryeṣayet, ya enaṃ tato bandhanāgārātparimocayeyuḥ |
T01bsu033_u:797: kiṃcāpi bhagavaṃstasya rājakumārasya tatra bandhānāgāre nābhiratiḥ, nātra parimucyate, yāvanna rājā prasādamupadarśayati |
T01bsu033_u:798: bhagavānāha - evameva ajita ye te bodhisattvā vicikitsāpatitāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti, (Sukhv, Vaidya 250) kāṅkṣati
T01bsu033_u:799: buddhajñānam, kiṃcāpi tena buddhanāmaśravaṇena tena ca cittaprasādamātreṇa
T01bsu033_u:800: atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadyante, na tu khalvaupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti, api tu padmeṣu garbhāvāsaṃ prativasanti |
T01bsu033_u:802: nāsti kheṭasiṃhāṇakam, na pratikūlaṃ manasaḥ pravartate, api tu khalu
T01bsu033_u:803: punaḥ pañca varṣaśatāni virahitā bhavanti buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena bodhisattvadarśanena dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayena sarvakuśalamūlena dharmacaryābhiśca |
T01bsu033_u:804: kiṃcāpi te tatra nābhiramante na tuṣṭiṃ vijānanti,api
T01bsu033_u:805: tu khalu punaḥ pūrvāparān kṣapayitsate bhūyastataḥ paścānniskrāmanti |
T01bsu033_u:806: na caiṣāṃ tato niṣkrāmatāṃ niṣkramaḥ prajñāyate ūrdhvamadhastiryagvā |
T01bsu033_u:807: paśya ajita etarhi nāma pañcabhirvarṣaśatairbahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasropasthānāni syurbahvaparimāṇāsaṃkhyeyāprameyāṇi ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitavyāni |
T01bsu033_u:809: paśya ajita kiyanmahate 'narthāya bodhisattvānāṃ vicikitsā saṃvartata iti
T01bsu033_u:810: | tasmāttarhi ajita bodhisattvairnirvicikitsairbodhaye cittamutpādya kṣipraṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhānāya sāmarthyapratilambhārthaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni, yatra bhagavānamitābhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ || Sukhv_41 ||
T01bsu033_u:812: evamukte ajito bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvā ito buddhakṣetrātpariniṣpannā anyeṣāṃ vā buddhānāṃ
T01bsu033_u:813: bhagavatāmantikātsukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante? bhagavānāha - ito hyajita buddhakṣetrād dvāsaptatikoṭīniyutāni bodhisattvānāṃ pariniṣpannāni
T01bsu033_u:814: yāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante pariniṣpannānāmavaivartikānāṃ bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyavaropitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ, kaḥ punarvādastataḥ parīttataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ duṣprasahasya tathāgatasyāntikādaṣṭādaśakoṭīniyutaśatāni bodhisattvānāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ
T01bsu033_u:816: pūrvāntare digbhāge ratnākaro nāma tathāgato viharati |
T01bsu033_u:829: tathāgatasyāntikātpañcaviṃśatirvīryaprāptā bodhisattvakoṭya ekaprasthānaprasthitā ekenāṣṭāhena navatikalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paścānmukhīkṛtya sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante |
T01bsu033_u:831: vaiśāradyaprāptasya tathāgatasyāntikādekonasaptatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyante amitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya paripṛcchanāya paripraśnīkaraṇāya etena ajita paryāyeṇa paripūrṇakalpakoṭīniyutaṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtayeyaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ yebhyaste bodhisattvā upasaṃkrāmanti sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tamamitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ draṣṭuṃ vanditu paryupāsitum, na śakyaśca paryanto 'dhigantum
T01bsu033_u:833: paśya ajita kiyatsulabdhalābhāste sattvā ye 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti |
T01bsu033_u:834: nāpi te sattvā hīnādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti ye 'ntaśaekacittaprasādamapi tasmiṃstathāgate 'bhilapyante,
T01bsu033_u:836: tasmāttarhi ajita ārocayāmi vaḥ, prativedayāmi sadevakasya lokasya purato 'sya dharmaparyāyasya śrāvaṇāya |
T01bsu033_u:837: trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi lokadhātumagnipūrṇamavagāhya atikramaikacittotpādamapi pratisāro na kartavyaḥ |
T01bsu033_u:839: bodhisattvakoṭyo hyajita aśravaṇādeṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
T01bsu033_u:840: tasmādasya dharmaparyāyasyādhyāśayena śravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇārthaṃ paryāvāptaye vistareṇa saṃprakāśāya bhāvanārthaṃ ca sumahadvīryamārabdhavyam |
T01bsu033_u:844: śāstṛsaṃjñā ca tatropādhyāye kartavyā ya icchati kṣipramaparimitān sattvānavaivartikatve 'nuttarāyāḥ
T01bsu033_u:845: pratiṣṭhāpayitum, tacca tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭum, ātmanaśca viśiṣṭāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadaṃ parigrahītumiti |
T01bsu033_u:846: api tu khalu ajita atyarthaṃ sulabdhalābhāste sattvā avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā buddhādhiṣṭhitāśca bhaviṣyanti, yeṣāmanāgate 'dhvani
T01bsu033_u:847: yāvatsaddharmavipralope vartamāne ime evaṃrūpā udārā dharmaparyāyāḥ sarvabuddhasaṃvarṇitāḥ sarvabuddhapraśastāḥ sarvabuddhānujñātā mahataḥ sarvajñajñānasya kṣipramāhārakāḥ śrotrāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti ye śrutvā codāraprītiprāmodyaṃ pratilapsyanta udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti parebhyo vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
T01bsu033_u:848: bhāvanābhiratāśca bhaviṣyanti, antaśo likhitvā pūjayiṣyanti, bahu ca te
T01bsu033_u:849: puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti, yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartum |
T01bsu033_u:850: iti hi ajita yattathāgatena kartavyam, kṛtaṃ mayā |
T01bsu033_u:859: asya khalu punarajita dharmaparyāyasya mahatīṃ parīndanāṃ karomi |
T01bsu033_u:864: atha khalu punarbhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu033_u:865: na me akṛtapuṇyānāṃ śravā bheṣyanti īdṛśāḥ /
T01bsu033_u:866: ye tu te śūra siddhārthāḥ śroṣyanti ca imāṃ giram // Sukhv_vs_49 //
T01bsu033_u:867: dṛṣṭo yaiśca hi saṃbuddho lokanāthaḥ prabhaṃkaraḥ //
T01bsu033_u:868: sagauravaiḥ śruto dharmaḥ prītiṃ prāpsyanti te parām // Sukhv_vs_50 //
T01bsu033_u:869: na śakta hīnehi kusīdadṛṣṭibhiḥ buddhāna dharmeṣu prasāda vinditum /
T01bsu033_u:870: ye buddhakṣetreṣu akārṣi pūjāṃ trailokanāthāna caryāsu śikṣiṣu //
T01bsu033_u:871: yathāndhakāre puruṣo hyacakṣuḥ mārgaṃ na jāne kutu saṃprakāśayet /
T01bsu033_u:872: sarvaṃ tathā śrāvaka buddhajñāne ajānakāḥ kiṃ punaradya sattvāḥ //
T01bsu033_u:873: buddho hi buddhasya guṇāṃ prajānate na devanāgāsurayakṣaśrāvakāḥ /
T01bsu033_u:874: anekabuddhāna pi no gatī yatho buddhasya jñāne hi prakāśyamāne //
T01bsu033_u:875: yadi sarvasattvāḥ samatā bhaveyuḥ viśuddhajñāne paramārthakovidāḥ /
T01bsu033_u:876: te kalpakoṭīratha vāpi uttare naikasya buddhasya guṇān katheyuḥ //
T01bsu033_u:877: atrāntare nirvṛta te bhaveyuḥ prakāśamānā bahukalpakoṭīḥ /
T01bsu033_u:878: na ca buddhajñānasya pramāṇu labhyate tathā hi jñānāścaryaṃ jinānām //
T01bsu033_u:879: tasmānnaraḥ paṇḍita vijñajātiyaḥ yo mahya vākyamabhiśraddadheya /
T01bsu033_u:880: kṛtsnāṃ sa sākṣājjinajñānamārgān buddhaḥ prajānaṃ ti girāmudīrayet //
T01bsu033_u:881: kadāci labhyati manuṣyalābhaḥ kadāci buddhāna pi prādurbhāvaḥ /
T01bsu033_u:883: śraddhārthaprajñā sucireṇa labhyate tasyārthaprāptyai janayet vīryam //
T01bsu033_u:884: ya īdṛśāṃ dharma śruṇitva śreṣṭhāṃ labhyanti prītiṃ sugataṃ smarantaḥ /
T01bsu033_u:885: te mitramasmākamatītamadhvani ye cāpi bodhāya jananti chandam //
T01bsu033_u:888: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānāṃ sattvaniyutakoṭīnāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham |
T01bsu033_u:893: sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapattaye ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya darśanakāmatayā |
T01bsu033_u:894: sarve ca te tatropapadya anupūrveṇa mañjusvarā nāma tathāgatā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣūpapatsyante
T01bsu033_u:895: aśītiśca niyutakoṭyo dīpaṃkare tathāgate labdhakṣāntikā avaivartikā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheramitāyuṣaiva tathāgatena paripācitāḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ carantastāśca sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadya pūrvapraṇidhānacaryāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti || Sukhv_45 ||
T01bsu033_u:904: ajito bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvasya loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti || Sukhv_47 ||
T01bsu033_u:905: bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya sukhāvatīguṇavarṇaparikīrtanaṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartyabhūmipraveśaḥ amitābhasya parivartaḥ
T01bsu033_u:907: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
T01bsu033_u:908: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
